pr_title: fixes #734: Ensure we move to the correct next field when using the reverse index

timeline.message: fixes #734: Ensure we move to the correct next field when using the reverse index
re #734: fixed additional bug in DiscoveryIterator related to reverse index
re #734: Added logic unit test case.  Found a couple more bugs in the process.

timeline.bodyText: Yikes!  Good catch.  Does this mean we were potentially returning things that we shouldn't have before this fix?
timeline.author: jwomeara
